title: How can i change the font color of the lock screen clock?
content:
Since the clock app get's the dark mode, the font color of the digital clock on the lock screen is black. This does not change even if i switch to light design on the display settings. I always use dark wallpapers, so a black lockscreen time is not readable.
How can i change the font color?
